popper-class.description: Custom class name for the pop-up menu
popper-class.description_zh: 弹出菜单的自定义类名

:show-timeout.description: Expand the delay of the sub-menu

:hide-timeout.description: Collapse the delay for the sub-menu

popper-append-to-body.description: Whether to insert a pop-up menu into the body element. If you're having trouble positioning the menu, you can try modifying the attribute
popper-append-to-body.description_zh: 是否将弹出菜单插入至 body 元素。在菜单的定位出现问题时，可尝试修改该属性
